backend/main.mo: Defines user profile, mood, gender, and relationship intent types with text conversions inside an actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a sound-provider wrapping change to affected files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style file describing summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variable definitions for light and dark modes plus global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup with theme, query client, router, and global SoundProvider wrapping all routes.
frontend/src/components/app/AppFooter.ts: Footer component showing app credits and an ICP logo.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation header with theme toggle, journal button, and user menu with profile and logout.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: App layout with header, footer, bottom nav, journal overlay, and sound effects manager around routed content.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Fixed bottom navigation bar with icon-first buttons and unread notifications badge.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Floating action button for composing a new entry when visible.
frontend/src/components/app/ThemeToggleB: Icon toggle switching between dark and light themes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Gate that shows loading, login, or authenticated children based on Internet Identity state.
Login screen using Internet Identity, showing branding, randomized subtext, and a button to start login with error handling.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Displays an energy summary for a circle by generating text from the provided posts.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Shows circle members with profile info and lets the user remove members, excluding themselves.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Form to enter a share code and send a join-circle request with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Lists pending join requests with profile details and actions to accept or decline each.
frontend/src/components/circle/SafePeopl: Manages selection of up to two Safe People from eligible candidates with profile lookup and toggle handling.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: Displays the user’s share code with copy and edit capabilities, including updating and normalizing new codes.
frontend/src/components/common/IconActio: Reusable button component that shows an icon with tooltip support and optional children.
frontend/src/components/common/Progressi: Collapsible section component with a button trigger and optional open state.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: Reminder card prompting users to complete a mood check-in with dismiss and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/feed/SilentSigna: Displays a silent signal entry with author info, mood styling, and timestamp.
Lets users send predefined silent signals to safe people, handling loading and setup states.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: Popover date picker for selecting journal dates, limited to today or earlier.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Manages viewing, creating, and deleting journal entries for a selected date with edit restrictions.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: Slide‑in journal UI combining rules, date selection, and entry management.
frontend/src/components/profile/MicroAct: Shows personalized micro‑action suggestions or fallback guidance based on mood history.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Analyzes mood trends and distribution over a timeframe, showing insights and related micro‑actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Wrapper that loads the user's profile, shows loading or error states, triggers profile setup if needed, and otherwise renders children.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Multi‑step onboarding dialog that collects user details and saves a new profile.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundEffec: Background component that plays sounds when new notifications, feed items, join requests, or circle members appear.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: UI for selecting predefined or custom context tags with validation and soft limits.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Searchable mood selector that groups moods by category and highlights the selected option.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Dialog prompting users to write a private note and optionally showing micro‑action suggestions based on mood history.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Displays a status post with author info, mood styling, timestamp, and optional audience count.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Provides predefined context tags and limits for custom tags.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Contains core app promise and boundary text strings.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Defines rotating login screen text and a helper to pick random phrases.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Lists mood options with labels, emojis, and categories mapped to backend Mood values.
frontend/src/constants/sounds.ts: Declares sound asset paths and an associated type for sound cues.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: Context managing visibility of a floating journal UI with show/hide controls.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: Context controlling the journal overlay's open state and reset-to-today behavior.
frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx: Context handling sound preferences, audio unlocking, and playback helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wrapper hook adding error tracking and refetching on top of useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/clear actions, and initializes AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Hooks for querying, creating, updating, and deleting journal entries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Builds a user's chronological mood history from feed status posts within a timeframe.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles, join requests, share codes, and other backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: Exports a simple hook that returns the sound context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes, layout, and safe-area utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Renders the Circle page with tabs for members, requests, joining, and safe people, using feed and request data.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: UI for composing and sharing a status with mood, content, tags, and audience selection.
frontend/src/pages/DailyCheckInPage.tsx: Daily check‑in flow for posting a mood update with guard logic and recent mood history.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Renders the main feed with refresh, mood reminder, composer, and feed items or empty state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays unread and read notifications, supports marking as read, and shows loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits the user's profile fields, handling validation, saving, and UI state toggles.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single status with loading and error handling, plus navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Utility functions for age calculation, formatting birthdates, and parsing date input.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Analyzes recent posts to derive a vibe summary, with mood categorization, seeding, and banned-term filtering.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Validates and normalizes custom tags, checking for emptiness, length, and duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInEntry.ts: Implements a sessionStorage guard for one-time daily check‑in entry behavior.
frontend/src/utils/microActions.ts: Defines micro-action types, mood classification helpers, and a rule engine that suggests short actions based on mood history and context tags.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Computes mood distributions, sentiment trends, concern levels, and guidance text based on mood history.
frontend/src/utils/moodColors.ts: Maps mood categories to Tailwind color and gradient class strings for UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Manages once-per-day mood reminder state using localStorage with helpers to check and dismiss it.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a random six‑character alphanumeric share code for onboarding.
frontend/src/utils/soundPreferences.ts: Gets and sets the user’s sound preference in localStorage with a default of enabled.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Provides time conversion between bigint nanoseconds and Date plus utilities for day boundaries and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, container settings, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s versioned state, including high‑level scope notes and a list of existing features with their IDs, descriptions, synonyms, and versions. Used as a structured inventory of current app capabilities for planning.
